Html:
Great software, Kirill!!!

Is there the possibility to make an extension with Bezier curves? How to do this? I'm very interested in Bezier and Polybezier!

Do you see any possibility in the near Future?

Thanks, Michael.

Hi Michael,

adding Bezier support is really easy - I just spent half an hour and I have a minimal sample working: http://livegeometry.com

In a nutshell, I've just added two files:

  1. http://livegeometry.codeplex.com/SourceControl/changeset/view/34442#598741 (Bezier.cs)
  2. http://livegeometry.codeplex.com/SourceControl/changeset/view/34442#598742 (BezierCreator.cs)

Let me know if this works for you. It should be easy to add further support (hit-testing, style support, polybeziers, etc.)

Thanks,

Kirill

Hi Kirill,

many thanks for your reply and the code.

I'll try it!

Thanks,

Michael

Hi Kirill,

it would be nice, if you find some time to implement Polybezier and hit-testing and style support for bezier curves and polybezier figures.

Is this possible? It would be great if you can do this.

Thanks,

Michael

I've just added Bezier hit-testing and style support. You can even place points on a Bezier curve.

How would you like to see PolyBeziers? How should the user input it? What would be the dependencies?
